required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Bioequivalence Study Of Xanax Extended Release Tablets From Two Different Manufacturing Sites
clinical_study.official_title: An Open Label, Randomized, Single Dose, Crossover Pivotal Bioequivalence Study Of Xanax XR Tablet 3 mg (Sourced From Caguas) Versus Xanax XR Tablet 3 mg (Sourced From Barceloneta) In Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: Study to evaluate if Xanax sustained release tablets manufactured at two different sites provide similar drug levels in the blood.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve from time zero to infinity (AUCinf) of alprazolam
primary_outcome.time_frame: Predose, and at 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours postdose
Predose, and at 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours postdose

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve from zero to the last time point (AUClast) of alprazolam
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose, and at 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours postdose

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve extrapolated (AUC%extrap) of alprazolam
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose, and at 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours postdose
Predose, and at 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours postdose

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to peak concentration (Tmax) of alprazolam
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose, and at 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours postdose

arm_group.description: Xanax XR tablets 3 mg (sourced from Caugus), 1 x 3 mg (REFERENCE)

intervention.intervention_name: Xanax XR tablets 3 mg (sourced from Caugus)
intervention.arm_group_label: Xanax XR tablets 3 mg (sourced from Caugus)

intervention.intervention_name: Xanax XR tablets 3 mg (sourced from Barceloneta)
intervention.arm_group_label: Xanax XR tablets 3 mg (sourced from Barceloneta),

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male and/or female subjects between the ages of 20 and 55 years, inclusive.
- An informed consent document signed and dated by the subject.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Evidence or history of clinically significant abnormality.
- A positive urine drug screen.
- Subjects who are hypersensitive to alprazolam or related compounds.

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

clinical_study.keyword: Panic disorder with or without agoraphobia.
